flavor: "There is no justice when some profit and others go without."
name: Alms Collector
text:
Flash
If an opponent would draw two or more cards, instead you and that player each draw a card.
title: Alms Collector

flavor: "What weapon will you bear against one who's mastered them all?"
name: Balan, Wandering Knight
text:
First strike
Balan, Wandering Knight has double strike as long as two or more Equipment are attached to it.
{1}{W}: Attach all Equipment you control to Balan.
title: Balan, Wandering Knight

flavor: Good health beckons many a vigorous follower.
name: Curse of Vitality
text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, you gain 2 life. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.
title: Curse of Vitality

flavor: ". . . Is it over?"
name: Fortunate Few
text: Choose a nonland permanent you don't control, then each other player chooses a nonland permanent he or she doesn't control that hasn't been chosen this way. Destroy all other nonland permanents.
title: Fortunate Few

name: Kindred Boon
text:
As Kindred Boon enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
{1}{W}: Put a divinity counter on target creature you control of the chosen type.
Each creature you control with a divinity counter on it has indestructible.
title: Kindred Boon

flavor: The justice of dragons demands more than just an eye for an eye.
name: Scalelord Reckoner
text:
Flying
Whenever a Dragon you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, destroy target nonland permanent that player controls.
title: Scalelord Reckoner

name: Stalking Leonin
text:
When Stalking Leonin enters the battlefield, secretly choose an opponent.
Reveal the player you chose: Exile target creature that's attacking you if it's controlled by the chosen player. Activate this ability only once.
title: Stalking Leonin

name: Teferi's Protection
text:
Until your next turn, your life total can't change and you have protection from everything. All permanents you control phase out. (While they're phased out, they're treated as though they don't exist. They phase in before you untap during your untap step.)
Exile Teferi's Protection.
title: Teferi's Protection

flavor: Idle chatter beckons many an attentive ear.
name: Curse of Verbosity
text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, you draw a card. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.
title: Curse of Verbosity

flavor: Ground bones, broken glass, and splintered shipwrecks make up the sands of his shores.
name: Galecaster Colossus
text: Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
title: Galecaster Colossus

flavor: Few things are truly "lost" at sea.
name: Kindred Discovery
text:
As Kindred Discovery enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Whenever a creature you control of the chosen type enters the battlefield or attacks, draw a card.
title: Kindred Discovery

flavor: "I'll show you what you truly desire."
name: Magus of the Mind
text: {U}, {T}, Sacrifice Magus of the Mind: Shuffle your library, then exile the top X cards, where X is one plus the number of spells cast this turn. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs.
title: Magus of the Mind

name: Portal Mage
text:
Flash
When Portal Mage enters the battlefield during the declare attackers step, you may reselect which player or planeswalker target attacking creature is attacking. (It can't attack its controller or its controller's planeswalkers.)
title: Portal Mage

flavor: "The veil of death hides little from our kind."
name: Bloodline Necromancer
text:
Lifelink
When Bloodline Necromancer enters the battlefield, you may return target Vampire or Wizard creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
title: Bloodline Necromancer

flavor: Death arrives on tattered wings and stolen bones.
name: Boneyard Scourge
text:
Flying
Whenever a Dragon you control dies while Boneyard Scourge is in your graveyard, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, return Boneyard Scourge from your graveyard to the battlefield.
title: Boneyard Scourge

flavor: Sounds of life beckon many a restless soul.
name: Curse of Disturbance
text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.
title: Curse of Disturbance

name: Kheru Mind-Eater
text:
Menace
Whenever Kheru Mind-Eater deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles a card from his or her hand face down.
You may look at and play cards exiled with Kheru Mind-Eater.
title: Kheru Mind-Eater

flavor: In the end, the lights fade, the land withers, and only the dead and vile remain.
name: Kindred Dominance
text: Choose a creature type. Destroy all creatures that aren't of the chosen type.
title: Kindred Dominance

flavor:
"Now isn't that better?"
—Olivia Voldaren
name: New Blood
text:
As an additional cost to cast New Blood, tap an untapped Vampire you control.
Gain control of target creature. Change the text of that creature by replacing all instances of one creature type with Vampire.
title: New Blood

name: Patron of the Vein
text:
Flying
When Patron of the Vein enters the battlefield, destroy target creature an opponent controls.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, exile it and put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.
title: Patron of the Vein

flavor: Heart, mind, soul—weapons all.
name: Vindictive Lich
text:
When Vindictive Lich dies, choose one or more. Each mode must target a different player.
• Target opponent sacrifices a creature.
• Target opponent discards two cards.
• Target opponent loses 5 life.
title: Vindictive Lich

flavor: "My liege will lead and I will follow—to the battlefield, to the grave, and beyond."
name: Bloodsworn Steward
text:
Flying
Commander creatures you control get +2/+2 and have haste.
title: Bloodsworn Steward

flavor: The finest soldiers aren't worth a whit without a set of hands to lead them and a set of eyes to guide them.
name: Crimson Honor Guard
text:
Trample
At the beginning of each player's end step, Crimson Honor Guard deals 4 damage to that player unless he or she controls a commander.
title: Crimson Honor Guard

flavor: Jingling coins beckon many an eager hand.
name: Curse of Opulence
text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a colorless artifact token named Gold. It has "Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool." Each opponent attacking that player does the same.
title: Curse of Opulence

flavor: Dinner and politics don't mix.
name: Disrupt Decorum
text: Goad all creatures you don't control. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)
title: Disrupt Decorum

name: Izzet Chemister
text:
Haste
{R}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard.
{1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Izzet Chemister: Cast any number of cards exiled with Izzet Chemister without paying their mana costs.
title: Izzet Chemister

flavor: For goblins, quantity is quality.
name: Kindred Charge
text: Choose a creature type. For each creature you control of the chosen type, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Those tokens gain haste. Exile them at the beginning of the next end step.
title: Kindred Charge

name: Shifting Shadow
text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has haste and "At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy this creature. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and attach Shifting Shadow to it, then put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in a random order."
title: Shifting Shadow

name: Territorial Hellkite
text:
Flying, haste
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose an opponent at random that Territorial Hellkite didn't attack during your last combat. Territorial Hellkite attacks that player this combat if able. If you can't choose an opponent this way, tap Territorial Hellkite.
title: Territorial Hellkite

flavor: Flavorful aromas beckon many a salivating maw.
name: Curse of Bounty
text:
Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player is attacked, untap all nonland permanents you control. Each opponent attacking that player untaps all nonland permanents he or she controls.
title: Curse of Bounty

name: Hungry Lynx
text:
Cats you control have protection from Rats. (They can't be blocked, targeted, or dealt damage by Rats.)
At the beginning of your end step, target opponent creates a 1/1 black Rat creature token with deathtouch.
Whenever a Rat dies, put a +1/+1 counter on each Cat you control.
title: Hungry Lynx

name: Kindred Summons
text: Choose a creature type. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal X creature cards of the chosen type, where X is the number of creatures you control of that type. Put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your library.
title: Kindred Summons

flavor: All things will crumble, whether by time or by force.
name: Qasali Slingers
text:
Reach
Whenever Qasali Slingers or another Cat enters the battlefield under your control, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
title: Qasali Slingers

flavor: With such great footsteps, everything is within walking distance.
name: Traverse the Outlands
text: Search your library for up to X basic land cards, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control. Put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
title: Traverse the Outlands

name: Arahbo, Roar of the World
text:
Eminence — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if Arahbo, Roar of the World is in the command zone or on the battlefield, another target Cat you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
Whenever another Cat you control attacks, you may pay {1}{G}{W}. If you do, it gains trample and gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.
title: Arahbo, Roar of the World

name: Edgar Markov
text:
Eminence — Whenever you cast another Vampire spell, if Edgar Markov is in the command zone or on the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Vampire creature token.
First strike, haste
Whenever Edgar Markov attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.
title: Edgar Markov

flavor: Self-reflection is not without its perils.
name: Fractured Identity
text: Exile target nonland permanent. Each player other than its controller creates a token that's a copy of it.
title: Fractured Identity

name: Inalla, Archmage Ritualist
text:
Eminence — Whenever another nontoken Wizard enters the battlefield under your control, if Inalla, Archmage Ritualist is in the command zone or on the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that Wizard. The token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
Tap five untapped Wizards you control: Target player loses 7 life.
title: Inalla, Archmage Ritualist

flavor: "Loss has no meaning here. You cannot take from those who have nothing."
name: Kess, Dissident Mage
text:
Flying
During each of your turns, you may cast an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. If a card cast this way would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead.
title: Kess, Dissident Mage

flavor: "I give my blood, my life, all I have in exchange for victory."
name: Licia, Sanguine Tribune
text:
Licia, Sanguine Tribune costs {1} less to cast for each 1 life you gained this turn.
First strike, lifelink
Pay 5 life: Put three +1/+1 counters on Licia. Activate this ability only during your turn and only once each turn.
title: Licia, Sanguine Tribune

name: Mairsil, the Pretender
text:
When Mairsil, the Pretender enters the battlefield, you may exile an artifact or creature card from your hand or graveyard and put a cage counter on it.
Mairsil, the Pretender has all activated abilities of all cards you own in exile with cage counters on them. You may activate each of those abilities only once each turn.
title: Mairsil, the Pretender

flavor: "All will know of your crimes."
name: Mathas, Fiend Seeker
text:
Menace
At the beginning of your end step, put a bounty counter on target creature an opponent controls. For as long as that creature has a bounty counter on it, it has "When this creature dies, each opponent draws a card and gains 2 life."
title: Mathas, Fiend Seeker

name: Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist
text:
First strike
Whenever Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist attacks, each opponent can't block with more than one creature this combat.
As long as Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist is tapped, no more than one creature can attack you each combat.
title: Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist

name: Nazahn, Revered Bladesmith
text:
When Nazahn, Revered Bladesmith enters the battlefield, search your library for an Equipment card and reveal it. If you reveal a card named Hammer of Nazahn this way, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
Whenever an equipped creature you control attacks, you may tap target creature defending player controls.
title: Nazahn, Revered Bladesmith

flavor: At his behest the Kami War began to regain That Which Was Taken.
name: O-Kagachi, Vengeful Kami
text:
Flying, trample
Whenever O-Kagachi, Vengeful Kami deals combat damage to a player, if that player attacked you during his or her last turn, exile target nonland permanent that player controls.
title: O-Kagachi, Vengeful Kami

name: Taigam, Ojutai Master
text:
Instant, sorcery, and Dragon spells you control can't be countered by spells or abilities.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell from your hand, if Taigam, Ojutai Master attacked this turn, that spell gains rebound. (Exile the spell as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast that card from exile without paying its mana cost.)
title: Taigam, Ojutai Master

name: Taigam, Sidisi's Hand
text:
Skip your draw step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
{B}, {T}, Exile X cards from your graveyard: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.
title: Taigam, Sidisi's Hand

name: The Ur-Dragon
text:
Eminence — As long as The Ur-Dragon is in the command zone or on the battlefield, other Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Flying
Whenever one or more Dragons you control attack, draw that many cards, then you may put a permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.
title: The Ur-Dragon

flavor: Once a fierce foe, she would become one of Madara's greatest protectors.
name: Wasitora, Nekoru Queen
text:
Flying, trample
Whenever Wasitora, Nekoru Queen deals combat damage to a player, that player sacrifices a creature. If the player can't, you create a 3/3 black, red, and green Cat Dragon creature token with flying.
title: Wasitora, Nekoru Queen

flavor: Spilled blood always begets more of the same.
name: Bloodforged Battle-Axe
title: Bloodforged Battle-Axe

name: Hammer of Nazahn
title: Hammer of Nazahn

name: Heirloom Blade
title: Heirloom Blade

name: Herald's Horn
text:
As Herald's Horn enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creature spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.
At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card of the chosen type, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.
title: Herald's Horn

name: Mirror of the Forebears
text:
As Mirror of the Forebears enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
{1}: Until end of turn, Mirror of the Forebears becomes a copy of target creature you control of the chosen type, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.
title: Mirror of the Forebears

name: Ramos, Dragon Engine
text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Ramos, Dragon Engine for each of that spell's colors.
Remove five +1/+1 counters from Ramos: Add {W}{W}{U}{U}{B}{B}{R}{R}{G}{G} to your mana pool. Activate this ability only once each turn.
title: Ramos, Dragon Engine

flavor: "By the time your knees have worn through your robe, you may have begun to learn your place."
name: Blind Obedience
text:
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
Artifacts and creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
title: Blind Obedience

flavor:
"No doubt the arbiters would put you away, after all the documents are signed. But I will have justice now."
—Alovnek, Boros guildmage
name: Condemn
text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library. Its controller gains life equal to its toughness.
title: Condemn

flavor: Survival of the purest.
name: Divine Reckoning
text:
Each player chooses a creature he or she controls. Destroy the rest.
Flashback {5}{W}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
title: Divine Reckoning

flavor:
"They had it coming."
—Squire Imalia, savior of Thiswick
name: Fell the Mighty
text: Destroy all creatures with power greater than target creature's power.
title: Fell the Mighty

flavor: Light's champion in the stronghold of darkness.
name: Jareth, Leonine Titan
text:
Whenever Jareth, Leonine Titan blocks, it gets +7/+7 until end of turn.
{W}: Jareth gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
title: Jareth, Leonine Titan

flavor:
"As my kha, he is the source of my inspiration. As my brother, he is the embodiment of my aspirations."
—Ajani Goldmane
name: Jazal Goldmane
text:
First strike
{3}{W}{W}: Attacking creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures.
title: Jazal Goldmane

flavor: "I am not Raksha. I never will be. But I refuse to be the kha who watched her pride be torn asunder."
name: Kemba, Kha Regent
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 white Cat creature token for each Equipment attached to Kemba, Kha Regent.
title: Kemba, Kha Regent

flavor: "Our people are torn by infighting. Until the two sides reconcile, our laws can carry no meaning."
name: Leonin Arbiter
text: Players can't search libraries. Any player may pay {2} for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.
title: Leonin Arbiter

name: Leonin Relic-Warder
text:
When Leonin Relic-Warder enters the battlefield, you may exile target artifact or enchantment.
When Leonin Relic-Warder leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
title: Leonin Relic-Warder

flavor: Her instinct is as sharp as her blade.
name: Leonin Shikari
text: You may activate equip abilities any time you could cast an instant.
title: Leonin Shikari

name: Orator of Ojutai
text:
As an additional cost to cast Orator of Ojutai, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand.
Defender, flying
When Orator of Ojutai enters the battlefield, if you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast Orator of Ojutai, draw a card.
title: Orator of Ojutai

name: Oreskos Explorer
text: When Oreskos Explorer enters the battlefield, search your library for up to X Plains cards, where X is the number of players who control more lands than you. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.
title: Oreskos Explorer

flavor: Some believe that Raksha, youngest of the kha, is the reincarnation of Dakan, the first and mightiest of leonin leaders.
name: Raksha Golden Cub
text:
Vigilance
As long as Raksha Golden Cub is equipped, Cat creatures you control get +2/+2 and have double strike.
title: Raksha Golden Cub

flavor: Some timelines forever fray, branch, and intermingle. Others end abruptly.
name: Return to Dust
text: Exile target artifact or enchantment. If you cast this spell during your main phase, you may exile up to one other target artifact or enchantment.
title: Return to Dust

flavor:
"End this. What I seek is far greater."
—Elesh Norn, Grand Cenobite
name: Rout
text:
You may cast Rout as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
title: Rout

name: Seht's Tiger
text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
When Seht's Tiger enters the battlefield, you gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn. (You can't be targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything of the chosen color.)
title: Seht's Tiger

flavor: Thieves know that a snarl in the night means, "Rob another house."
name: Spirit of the Hearth
text:
Flying
You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
title: Spirit of the Hearth

flavor:
"We trust in the scalelords, bringers of justice that none can escape."
—Urdnan, Dromoka warrior
name: Sunscorch Regent
text:
Flying
Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Sunscorch Regent and you gain 1 life.
title: Sunscorch Regent

flavor: Left without their leader Raksha, the leonin split into two prides: one side supported the regent kha, while the other rebelled in fury.
name: Sunspear Shikari
text: As long as Sunspear Shikari is equipped, it has first strike and lifelink.
title: Sunspear Shikari

flavor: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.
name: Swords to Plowshares
text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
title: Swords to Plowshares

name: Taj-Nar Swordsmith
text: When Taj-Nar Swordsmith enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. If you do, search your library for an Equipment card with converted mana cost X or less and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
title: Taj-Nar Swordsmith

flavor: After the Battle of Liet Field, the white sun crested above Taj-Nar, bringing hope to all who survived the carnage.
name: White Sun's Zenith
text: Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens. Shuffle White Sun's Zenith into its owner's library.
title: White Sun's Zenith

name: Wing Shards
text:
Target player sacrifices an attacking creature.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)
title: Wing Shards

flavor: He has journeyed where none have been before. Now he returns to ensure that none follow.
name: Arcanis the Omnipotent
text:
{T}: Draw three cards.
{2}{U}{U}: Return Arcanis the Omnipotent to its owner's hand.
title: Arcanis the Omnipotent

flavor: "Words of power never disappear. They sleep, awaiting those with the will to rouse them."
name: Archaeomancer
text: When Archaeomancer enters the battlefield, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
title: Archaeomancer

flavor:
"Choices belong to those with the luxuries of time and distance. We have neither. I recommend we proceed with the plan to destroy all shrines of the kami."
—Lady Azami, letter to Sensei Hisoka
name: Azami, Lady of Scrolls
text: Tap an untapped Wizard you control: Draw a card.
title: Azami, Lady of Scrolls

flavor: "I am who I pretend to be."
name: Body Double
text: You may have Body Double enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature card in a graveyard.
title: Body Double

flavor: Their lust for battle was so great that they didn't care their enemies wore their own faces.
name: Clone Legion
text: For each creature target player controls, create a token that's a copy of that creature.
title: Clone Legion

name: Harbinger of the Tides
text:
You may cast Harbinger of the Tides as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)
When Harbinger of the Tides enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
title: Harbinger of the Tides

flavor: "Roil tide! Roil tide! Tie yourselves down!"
name: Into the Roil
text:
Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If Into the Roil was kicked, draw a card.
title: Into the Roil

flavor: To scrape out a living in Aphetto, wizards are reduced to selling rumors, lies, forgeries, or—if they get desperate enough—the truth.
name: Merchant of Secrets
text: When Merchant of Secrets enters the battlefield, draw a card.
title: Merchant of Secrets

name: Monastery Siege
text:
As Monastery Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.
• Khans — At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card, then discard a card.
• Dragons — Spells your opponents cast that target you or a permanent you control cost {2} more to cast.
title: Monastery Siege

flavor: "Opportunity isn't something you wait for. It's something you create."
name: Opportunity
text: Target player draws four cards.
title: Opportunity

flavor:
"The flies were bothering me."
—Jalira, master polymorphist
name: Polymorphist's Jest
text: Until end of turn, each creature target player controls loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1.
title: Polymorphist's Jest

name: Reality Shift
text: Exile target creature. Its controller manifests the top card of his or her library. (That player puts the top card of his or her library onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature. If it's a creature card, it can be turned face up any time for its mana cost.)
title: Reality Shift

flavor: "The secret entrance should be near."
name: Sea Gate Oracle
text: When Sea Gate Oracle enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
title: Sea Gate Oracle

flavor: "Even a dragon is humble as a kitten if it thinks itself a slave."
name: Serendib Sorcerer
text: {T}: Target creature other than Serendib Sorcerer has base power and toughness 0/2 until end of turn.
title: Serendib Sorcerer

name: Spelltwine
text: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard and target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard. Copy those cards. Cast the copies if able without paying their mana costs. Exile Spelltwine.
title: Spelltwine

flavor:
"Conquering your first world is the hardest, after all. My power grew as I moved from world to world, taking anything that would make the next taking easier."
—Ob Nixilis
name: Ambition's Cost
text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.
title: Ambition's Cost

flavor: "So many have died in search of that map. And now it appears in the hands of the arrogant child Chandra Nalaar."
name: Anowon, the Ruin Sage
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player sacrifices a non-Vampire creature.
title: Anowon, the Ruin Sage

flavor: A mage willing to dedicate his life to his craft.
name: Apprentice Necromancer
text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Apprentice Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it.
title: Apprentice Necromancer

name: Black Market
text:
Whenever a creature dies, put a charge counter on Black Market.
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add {B} to your mana pool for each charge counter on Black Market.
title: Black Market

flavor: "Great art can never be created without great suffering."
name: Blood Artist
text: Whenever Blood Artist or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
title: Blood Artist

name: Blood Tribute
text:
Kicker—Tap an untapped Vampire you control. (You may tap a Vampire you control in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.)
Target opponent loses half his or her life, rounded up. If Blood Tribute was kicked, you gain life equal to the life lost this way.
title: Blood Tribute

name: Bloodhusk Ritualist
text:
Multikicker {B} (You may pay an additional {B} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
When Bloodhusk Ritualist enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card for each time it was kicked.
title: Bloodhusk Ritualist

name: Bloodlord of Vaasgoth
text:
Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.)
Flying
Whenever you cast a Vampire creature spell, it gains bloodthirst 3.
title: Bloodlord of Vaasgoth

flavor: His verdict is always guilty. His sentence is always death.
name: Butcher of Malakir
text:
Flying
Whenever Butcher of Malakir or another creature you control dies, each opponent sacrifices a creature.
title: Butcher of Malakir

name: Captivating Vampire
text:
Other Vampire creatures you control get +1/+1.
Tap five untapped Vampires you control: Gain control of target creature. It becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types.
title: Captivating Vampire

name: Consuming Vapors
text:
Target player sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)
title: Consuming Vapors

flavor: Even when the flesh grows cold, knowledge waits in the bones for a master to release it.
name: Corpse Augur
text: When Corpse Augur dies, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of creature cards in target player's graveyard.
title: Corpse Augur

flavor: Ugin's whispered summons led Sarkhan Vol to the moment that would echo down the centuries and seal Tarkir's fate: the primal battle between Ugin and Nicol Bolas.
name: Crux of Fate
text:
Choose one —
• Destroy all Dragon creatures.
• Destroy all non-Dragon creatures.
title: Crux of Fate

flavor:
"Silumgar's mind is a dark labyrinth, full of grim secrets and subtle traps."
—Siara, the Dragon's Mouth
name: Damnable Pact
text: Target player draws X cards and loses X life.
title: Damnable Pact

flavor: "Ah, this is a nice life. I can see why you were so desperate to keep it."
name: Dark Impostor
text:
{4}{B}{B}: Exile target creature and put a +1/+1 counter on Dark Impostor.
Dark Impostor has all activated abilities of all creature cards exiled with it.
title: Dark Impostor

name: Deathbringer Regent
text:
Flying
When Deathbringer Regent enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand and there are five or more other creatures on the battlefield, destroy all other creatures.
title: Deathbringer Regent

name: Decree of Pain
text:
Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.
Cycling {3}{B}{B} ({3}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Decree of Pain, all creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
title: Decree of Pain

flavor: "If our former masters would have us kneel again, they shall feel our defiance slashed across their membranes."
name: Drana, Kalastria Bloodchief
text:
Flying
{X}{B}{B}: Target creature gets -0/-X until end of turn and Drana, Kalastria Bloodchief gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
title: Drana, Kalastria Bloodchief

flavor: "I often think on how excited they must feel to be chosen as my prey."
name: Falkenrath Noble
text:
Flying
Whenever Falkenrath Noble or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
title: Falkenrath Noble

flavor: Having flesh is increasingly a liability on Mirrodin.
name: Go for the Throat
text: Destroy target nonartifact creature.
title: Go for the Throat

flavor: He climbs a staircase of falling souls, fighting the continuous pull of the void.
name: Magus of the Abyss
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, destroy target nonartifact creature that player controls of his or her choice. It can't be regenerated.
title: Magus of the Abyss

name: Malakir Bloodwitch
text:
Flying, protection from white
When Malakir Bloodwitch enters the battlefield, each opponent loses life equal to the number of Vampires you control. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
title: Malakir Bloodwitch

flavor: It shambled from the cloud of ash and bone dust, undeterred by its own extinction.
name: Necromantic Selection
text: Destroy all creatures, then return a creature card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control. It's a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types. Exile Necromantic Selection.
title: Necromantic Selection

flavor: As the Eldrazi spread, no secret that could give Zendikar's defenders an advantage was considered too dangerous to seek.
name: Painful Truths
text: Converge — You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of colors of mana spent to cast Painful Truths.
title: Painful Truths

name: Palace Siege
text:
As Palace Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.
• Khans — At the beginning of your upkeep, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Dragons — At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
title: Palace Siege

name: Pawn of Ulamog
text: Whenever Pawn of Ulamog or another nontoken creature you control dies, you may create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C} to your mana pool."
title: Pawn of Ulamog

name: Puppeteer Clique
text:
Flying
When Puppeteer Clique enters the battlefield, put target creature card from an opponent's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. It gains haste. At the beginning of your next end step, exile it.
Persist (When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
title: Puppeteer Clique

flavor: The dead know lessons the living haven't learned.
name: Read the Bones
text: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You lose 2 life. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
title: Read the Bones

name: Sangromancer
text:
Flying
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, you may gain 3 life.
Whenever an opponent discards a card, you may gain 3 life.
title: Sangromancer

flavor:
"Blood is constant. Every drop I drink, someone must bleed."
—Vradeen, vampire nocturnus
name: Sanguine Bond
text: Whenever you gain life, target opponent loses that much life.
title: Sanguine Bond

name: Skeletal Scrying
text:
As an additional cost to cast Skeletal Scrying, exile X cards from your graveyard.
You draw X cards and you lose X life.
title: Skeletal Scrying

name: Skeletal Vampire
text:
Flying
When Skeletal Vampire enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying.
{3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a Bat: Create two 1/1 black Bat creature tokens with flying.
Sacrifice a Bat: Regenerate Skeletal Vampire.
title: Skeletal Vampire

flavor: When tempers run high, it's easy to lose your head.
name: Syphon Mind
text: Each other player discards a card. You draw a card for each card discarded this way.
title: Syphon Mind

flavor: If you're looking for it, it's available. The question is how much you're willing to pay.
name: Underworld Connections
text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}, Pay 1 life: Draw a card."
title: Underworld Connections

flavor: As they fought the Eldrazi, many vampires learned to live among humans. Others were unable to make the adjustment.
name: Vampire Nighthawk
text: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink
title: Vampire Nighthawk

name: Vein Drinker
text:
Flying
{R}, {T}: Vein Drinker deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to Vein Drinker.
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Vein Drinker this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Vein Drinker.
title: Vein Drinker

name: Chaos Warp
text: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into his or her library, then reveals the top card of his or her library. If it's a permanent card, he or she puts it onto the battlefield.
title: Chaos Warp

name: Comet Storm
text:
Multikicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} any number of times as you cast this spell.)
Choose target creature or player, then choose another target creature or player for each time Comet Storm was kicked. Comet Storm deals X damage to each of them.
title: Comet Storm

flavor:
"The dragon is a perfect marriage of power and the will to use it."
—Sarkhan Vol
name: Crucible of Fire
text: Dragon creatures you control get +3/+3.
title: Crucible of Fire

name: Dragon Tempest
text:
Whenever a creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, it gains haste until end of turn.
Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of Dragons you control.
title: Dragon Tempest

flavor: Atarka serving-goblins coat themselves with grease imbued with noxious herbs, hoping to discourage their ravenous masters from adding them to the meal.
name: Dragonlord's Servant
text: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
title: Dragonlord's Servant

flavor: "We speak the dragons' language of flame and rage. They speak our language of fury and honor. Together we shall weave a tale of destruction without equal."
name: Dragonspeaker Shaman
text: Dragon spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
title: Dragonspeaker Shaman

flavor: They fell screaming into the depths of the chasm like so many pebbles tossed down a well.
name: Earthquake
text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

name: Hellkite Charger
text:
Flying, haste
Whenever Hellkite Charger attacks, you may pay {5}{R}{R}. If you do, untap all attacking creatures and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
title: Hellkite Charger

name: Outpost Siege
text:
As Outpost Siege enters the battlefield, choose Khans or Dragons.

flavor: "If you're not having fun, what's the point of living forever?"
name: Rakish Heir

name: Ryusei, the Falling Star
text:
Flying
When Ryusei, the Falling Star dies, it deals 5 damage to each creature without flying.
title: Ryusei, the Falling Star

text:
Flying
Whenever Scourge of Valkas or another Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, it deals X damage to target creature or player, where X is the number of Dragons you control.
{R}: Scourge of Valkas gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

flavor: Nothing escapes its gaze—or its breath.
name: Tyrant's Familiar
text:
Flying, haste

flavor: The fear of dragons is as old and as powerful as the fear of death itself.

text:
Flying
Whenever a Dragon you control attacks, create a 6/6 red Dragon creature token with flying.

name: Abundance
text: If you would draw a card, you may instead choose land or nonland and reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and put all other cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

flavor:
"Your veil's curse won't stop me, deathmage. I have taken down countless night hunters and this dark plane is not big enough for you to hide."
—Garruk Wildspeaker, to Liliana Vess
name: Crushing Vines
text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with flying.
• Destroy target artifact.

flavor:
"I want to help Zendikar. Show me the way."
—Nissa Revane
name: Elemental Bond
text: Whenever a creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

flavor: "How truly vast this city must be, that I have traveled so far and seen so much, yet never once found the place where the buildings fail."
name: Farseek

text:

flavor: "Words lie. People lie. The land tells the truth."
name: Harmonize
text: Draw three cards.

name: Hunter's Prowess
text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards."

flavor: The cat warriors recognized this Jedit's face, but not his fierce loyalty to Efrava.

text:
Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
Whenever Jedit Ojanen of Efrava attacks or blocks, create a 2/2 green Cat Warrior creature token with forestwalk.

flavor:
"The land grows only where the kami will it."
—Dosan the Falling Leaf

text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

text:
Search your library for up to two basic Forest cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

text:
Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana to your mana pool of any type that land produced. (The types of mana are white, blue, black, red, green, and colorless.)
Whenever you cast a creature spell, draw a card.

Flying

Flying
